summary: Frontend Button Removal: Git History Search Reveals No Pre-Button Version

message.content:
PASO 1: Descargar la versiÃ³n correcta desde GitHub
cd /var/www/moonyetis-slots/moonyetis-backend
# Backup actual
cp frontend/index.html frontend/index.html.backup
# Descargar versiÃ³n correcta
curl -o frontend/index.html
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MoonYetis/moonyetis-production/production-deploy/moonyetis-backend/frontend/index.html
PASO 2: Verificar funcionalidades segÃºn la especificaciÃ³n
# Crear script de verificaciÃ³n basado en tu spec
cat > verify-spec.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
echo "ğŸ” VERIFICACIÃ“N SEGÃšN ESPECIFICACIÃ“N"
echo "=================================="
# âŒ NO debe tener botones Auto/Turbo (no estÃ¡n en la spec)
BUTTONS=$(grep -c "auto-spin\|turbo" frontend/index.html)
echo "1. Botones Auto/Turbo: $BUTTONS (debe ser 0)"
# âœ… DEBE tener Advanced Wallet Panel
WALLET=$(grep -c "Balance.*Historial.*DepÃ³sitos.*Retiros\|wallet.*panel" frontend/index.html)
echo "2. Advanced Wallet Panel: $WALLET (debe ser > 0)"
# âœ… DEBE tener sistema de audio (8 sonidos)
AUDIO=$(grep -c "Web Audio API\|audio.*context\|sound" frontend/index.html)
echo "3. Sistema de Audio: $AUDIO (debe ser > 0)"
# âœ… DEBE tener WebSocket
WS=$(grep -c "WebSocket\|socket\.io" frontend/index.html)
echo "4. WebSocket Real-time: $WS (debe ser > 0)"
# âœ… DEBE tener configuraciones
CONFIG=$(grep -c "settings\|config" frontend/index.html)
echo "5. Panel Configuraciones: $CONFIG (debe ser > 0)"
EOF
chmod +x verify-spec.sh
./verify-spec.sh
PASO 3: Si estÃ¡ correcto, reiniciar
pm2 restart moonyetis-slots
PASO 4: VerificaciÃ³n final
curl -s http://168.231.124.18 | grep -c "auto-spin\|turbo"

content.text: I'll help you execute these steps to download the correct version and verify the specifications. Let me create a todo list to track this process.

Download correct version from GitHub repository
Create and run verification script according to specifications
Restart moonyetis-slots service if verification passes
Perform final verification check
